div.bibl: Novi Svijet Vol. IX, No. 3, Aug. 15, 1931 NOVI ROD NOW IN ENGLISH

body.p: In a notice to the public the undersigned announces that the monthly periodical Novi Rod (New Generation) will be printed in English, beginning with the next issue, and under the same name, which translated is The New Generation.

Also, we announce to our friends and subscribers that we will continue to issue one edition every three months in Croatian. For every season of the year a large size edition will be printed. The fall edition will be off the press in October; the winter number for Christmas; the spring number for Easter, and the summer number will be put out before the school vacations.

In connection with changes our readers attention is called to all subscribers in good standing receiving the magazine as before, and without additional payment receiving the bi-monthly edition until their subscriptions
expire.
B. N. Milosevic, Editor of New Generation
